Clock Management

Collaboration diagram for Clock Management:

Modules

 Oscillator Management
 PLL Management
 System Clock Management

Detailed Description

This group includes functions for managing different kinds of clocks in the system. Such clock may range from fixed-frequency oscillator through Phase-Locked Loops (PLLs) to synchronous peripheral and CPU clocks.
